effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.

short_effect.x-y: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

flavor_text.x-y: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.
